nodes.bodyText:
To support also RHEL 8, this could use a fact:

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                - ../src/packages/build/rhel/7/noarch/xroad-*rpm
          
          
            
                - ../src/packages/build/rhel/7/x86_64/xroad-*rpm
          
          
            
                - ../src/packages/build/rhel/{{ ansible_distribution_major_version }}/noarch/xroad-*rpm
          
          
            
                - ../src/packages/build/rhel/{{ ansible_distribution_major_version }}/x86_64/xroad-*rpm
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,9 +3,8 @@
   become: yes
   copy: src={{item}} dest=/xroad/local/RPMS/ force=no
   with_fileglob:
-    - ../src/packages/build/xroad/redhat/RPMS/noarch/xroad-*rpm
-    - ../src/packages/build/xroad/redhat/RPMS/x86_64/xroad-*rpm
-    - ../src/packages/build/xroad-jetty9/redhat/RPMS/x86_64/xroad-*rpm
+    - ../src/packages/build/rhel/7/noarch/xroad-*rpm
+    - ../src/packages/build/rhel/7/x86_64/xroad-*rpm
